thread.title: Sarah West
thread.title_full: The Birth Poster betygsatt av Sarah West

author: Sarah West
title: Sarah West
text: I purchased a print for my eldest son roughly 3 years ago. I went to purchase another matching one for my newborn last month and in the time time between my 2 boys the writing choices and colours had changed. When I received the new one for my baby, they had printed a complimentary second one for my first born matching the new colour. Wow, blew me away. Thanks so much for caring. Also the free shipping is an added bonus. I highly recommend these to all my family and friends ðŸ˜ŠðŸ’—
